resources:
Android Challenge No.8
//// Buttons ///////////////////
PREV NEXT True False
/// Questions /////////////
The Channel Tunnel is the longest rail tunnel in the world? A woman has walked on the Moon? According to Scottish law, it is illegal to be drunk in charge of a cow? An emu can fly? There are more than 100 bridges over the Amazon River? Can any one see the moon?
the five rings on the Olympic flag are interlocking? Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in the world? Strictly Come Dancing first aired in the UK in 2005? a group of swans is known as a bevy? Sydney is the capital of Australia? the Penny Black is an old-fashioned coin?
Glastonbury had been due to celebrate its 50th anniversary in June before the festival was cancelled? Will.i.am is the only mentor to have appeared on every single series of The Voice UK? a heptagon has eight sides? the star sign Capricorn is represented by a goat? fish cannot blink? seahorses have no teeth or stomach?
